programme.desc: Jethalal goes looking for Bhide's scooter in order to return it to him. However, the thieves are planning on selling it.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.desc: Daya asks if Jethalal has planned to do anything because she is preparing a special dish, and wants him to stay in for it.

programme.desc: Jethalal is excited to have Daya's dinner and invites Mehata to feast with him. However, when he arrives home, he learns Daya has been out shopping with the ladies.

programme.desc: While shopping, Madhavi loses her purse with all the important and expensive items inside, and the ladies promise to help her find it.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: After coming home, Daya faces her upset family. However, she feels relieved to know that they were only pretending to be mad at her.

programme.desc: Tapu spends his holiday playing cricket in Gokuldham, which leads to property damage that causes everyone frustration.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
